mapper.update: update bd_servicelog set oldservicedate = #{oldservicedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, newservicedate = #{newservicedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, oldservicedate, newservicedate, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag from bd_servicelog where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
